name: Neverendungeon
description:
You are a hero in an endless dungeon. See how deep you can go before you meet your demise. Remember:

  • heavier weapons hit harder, but deplete your stamina faster,
  • if you overexert yourself, you will get hurt,
  • the deeper you go, the stronger the weapons (and monsters),
  • healing plants can save your life, but you can't take them with you.

Controls:

  • num 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 - move/ attack/ eat plant
  • num 5 - wait
  • num 0 - pick up weapon
  • enter - go to next level
  • / (num divide) - toggle overhead info

Legend:

  • @ - hero
  • s, p, g... (lowercase letters) - monster
  • B, M, C... (uppercase letters) - weapon
  • E - stairs
  • ♣ (club symbol) - healing plant

Note! If you are having trouble with the console (a vertical or horizontal scroll is appearing), it's probably because the console buffer is too big for your screen. Right-click the window title bar and go into Properties->Font, and try decreasing the font size. Then resize the console until the scrolls disappear, and you're good to go :)
